text:
Just reading theme requirements
4. Themes must respect a 12-column grid
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/marketplace-guidelines/theme-requirements#themes-must-respect-a-12-column-grid>

Does this just mean for the DND it should include the default 12col grid?

Or does it mean everything I build should follow the grid system, which may be flexible to edit but isn’t very fluid when it comes to responsive, also 12 col doesn’t let you show 5 things in a row nicely
yeah, you have to support the classic HubSpot layout.css classes for their drag and drop editor
Ah okay so i guess in my modules I can create a full width module and ignore all the layout.css classes, as long as the dnd works that’s fine
